dc_title_s: New household and commercial map of the United States
dc_description_s: 1 map on 2 sheets : col. ; 95 x 140 cm|Relief shown by hachures.|Border includes flags of various countries, map of the world, and views of Washington, D.C., New York, Mount Vernon and the Capitol building.|Includes profiles of the continent along 42nd parallel, route for the Pacific Railroad and the North Atlantic.|Includes a circular chart which shows solar time variation from the National Observatory in Washington, D.C.
